name: Shoohel
title: Creative Developer & Designer
summary: Motivated and detail-oriented individual with a strong foundation in computer applications and creative problem-solving. Experienced in both technical and design domains, passionate about building user-focused solutions and continuous learning.

skills.details: Proficient in building cross-platform mobile applications using React Native with a focus on clean UI and efficient performance. Experienced in creating RESTful APIs and backend services using Node.js and Express.
Designing commercial flyers and banners for events and startups.
Building responsive, fast, and modern websites tailored to user needs and brands.

projects.name: AskMyPC
projects.description: AskMyPC is a local desktop assistant powered by Google's Gemini Pro 2.5, enabling users to control their Windows PC using natural language queries.

projects.name: SDR Agent
projects.description: This is a multi-agent SDR (Sales Development Rep) workflow built with LangChain, Gemini, and Serper.dev. It takes a list of leads, researches them, writes a personalized email, and reviews it â€” all autonomously.
